alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis and southern Lake Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Babbitt, to Wolf Lake, to Boulder Lake, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Brimson around 705 PM CDT. Thomas Lake Near Brimson and Highland Lake around 715 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Isabella, Larsmont, Knife River, Two Harbors, Beaver Bay, Dumbbell Lake and Split Rock Lighthouse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
